title: I asked an apartment leasing agent what the resident mix was, in terms of were they professions, students...  All she would say was that they rent to any qualified applicant. Are leasing agents not allowed to give this information?  If someone, for instance, has children and wants to know if families live in the complex, the agent couldn\'t say?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=16565
